sourcesContent: import{useRef as n,useEffect as t}from"react";export default function(e,r,i){void 0===i&&(i=global);var o=n();t(function(){o.current=r},[r]),t(function(){if(i&&i.addEventListener){var n=function(n){return o.current(n)};return i.addEventListener(e,n),function(){i.removeEventListener(e,n)}}},[e,i])}
